detectors.description: CMC.totalSupply() (contracts/CMC.sol#176-181) uses a weak PRNG: assets.length > initialSupply (contracts/CMC.sol#177)
CMC.getAsset(uint256) (contracts/CMC.sol#106-108) uses a weak PRNG: assets[_id] (contracts/CMC.sol#107)
CMC.getMyAssets() (contracts/CMC.sol#126-136) uses a weak PRNG: result (contracts/CMC.sol#135)
ERC721._exists(uint256) (@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#223-225) uses a weak PRNG: _owners[tokenId] != address(0) (@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#224)

CMC.createAndMint(address) (contracts/CMC.sol#158-164) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: rand = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.difficulty,block.timestamp,msg.sender,assets.length))) (contracts/CMC.sol#159)
